title: New: Charlotte Cardin – Like It Doesn't Hurt (Feat. Husser)
body:
This new track from French-Canadian singer **Charlotte Cardin** is basically everything the early tracks from BANKS promised, but never delivered on.

Vaguely ominous sounding at moments – it’s one of the best tracks of the year so far. Check it below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
